Text:
Nu arrives at the masquerade ball along with Claire,
who wants to find Cid. The two secretly discuss
their strategy—

There's something strange about the atmosphere here.
It's extravagant and gaudy... Something seems off...

Yes, it's certainly different from an ordinary
party... Are you scared?
Huh? Of course not.

There are probably clues to finding Cid in there,
right? So, let's get going—

Wait. The main purpose of attending this ball is to
gather intelligence.
I know that. What are you getting at?

Being undercover means we need to be smooth and
discreet. Please be sure to maintain a ladylike
composure so as not to cause a scene.
Yeah, yeah. So, we have to blend in, right?

...To be honest, I don't want to act ladylike and
refined.

You sure are full of complaints. Whatever, let's
stay close for a while.

I'll be fine on my own... Don't tell me, you're
scared?
Yes, I am scared. Scared of you messing things up.

...Hmph, Well, excuse me... Don't worry, I'll be
"ladylike," just as you said.

Anyway, let's start gathering info. We can find some
unsuspecting blabbermouth aristocrat and—

Okay, then let's target that noblewoman over there.
She looks like she loves to gossip.

You seem to know a lot. Did you investigate her in
advance?

No, it's info I picked up after getting here. As I
said, it's all about being smooth and discreet.

(She just got here, but she's already gotten a feel
for the place.)

...You really are exceptional. Alright, let's mix
and mingle.

Then, take this. You'll look suspicious without a
glass in hand.
...You're way too good at this.

One more piece of advice. Keep an eye on your glass
at all times.

...And listen when others are talking—Huh?
Is that part of etiquette?

It's not etiquette, it's to protect yourself. At
parties like these, there are always pathetic
lowlifes that'll try to slip something into your
drink.
Thanks for the warning... That's really heinous.
Indeed. Now then, stay on your toes—
Ah, what lovely ladies. Care for a chat?
(Ugh, right on cue. He even looks like a pervert...)
Pardon us. We'd like to enjoy our meal...

What a coincidence. I was just looking to satisfy my
appetite as well. With gorgeous ladies such as
yourselves, is that is.

How about we get out of here and return to my
abode? We can enjoy first-class food and savor
the finest wine.
Hey! Didn't you hear—
Settle down. ...Please excuse my companion.

(...What? We have to act "ladylike" even in times
like this?)

I couldn't possibly accept such a generous offer...
Please have a good time with more attractive ladies.

Oh, how elegantly modest! You are the ideal woman
I've been searching for. Would you please at least
give me the honor of a dance?

I simply couldn't stand the sight of seeing you
dance with another man! So, take my hand
and enjoy a romantic evening with me!

I'm honored by your invitation, but...I'm not yet
accustomed to dancing. I couldn't bring myself
to embarrass a dashing gentleman like you.
Then, I shall teach you to dance, step-by-step...

(He just wants to put his grubby hands on her!
Ughhh, I can't watch!)
Hey you! Get a clue—!
Ow-ow-ow-ow?!
...Huh?

If you keep struggling, you'll dislocate your
shoulder. Please keep silent.
"Keep silent?!" How rude!
I'll say it again.

...Unless you want your arm broken, you'll make
yourself scarce at once.

*gasp*...Eeeeeek! As if I would stay around here!
What a night! I can't believe it!
Ta-ta. Have a lovely night.

...Shall we gather information before we encounter
any more interruptions?
Oh...yeah... Sure.

(...Who was it again that sternly warned me to act
"ladylike"?)
Is something the matter?
That smile of yours is refreshing...

Claire can say nothing in the face of Nu's knowing
smile. The two return to collecting information
together.
